defaultCheckedValues.description: The default selected options for un-controlled component.

direction.description: Display group of elements in a compact row.

name.description: The name used to reference the value of the control.

onChange.description:
Callback fired when a checkbox is clicked.
`event.target.value` returns the value of the checkbox that was clicked.

readOnly.description: If `true`, the component is read only.

wrap.description: Only for horizontal direction. When `true` the text in radio button label will wrap to fit within the container. Otherwise, the checkboxes will wrap onto the next line.
